article_title: Rubio Wins, Bush Falters, Huckabee Exaggerates

article_metadata.description: Last night’s first Republican debate for the 2016 nomination was a grab bag: national security, abortion, faith, even Rosie O’Donnell. Economics played some role, though I’d love to see an entire debate on this subject, which undergirds all others. A consensus among the political class is that Sen. Marco Rubio [...]
article_metadata.author: Carrie Sheffield
